definition: to take the lid off/to expose/to unmask

sentences.english: Ithas long been my dream to make a speech in English.
sentences.chinese: 用英語揭櫫演講一直是我的夢想。

sentences.english: The paper reveals first time the discourse of feat in the history of Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次揭櫫事功話語在秦史中的特殊意義。
